Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Great peaceful and lovely place where to have breakfast. I felt like home here‚Ä¶ Will be back for sure! Thank you for your kindness (and your delicious carrot cake)!

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: The Zuivere Koffie was a great discovery in our walking tour. We were heading to a restaurant for breakfast and saw this place. I love all the details, like flowers, decoration, silverware. The food was very good!It won‚Äôt disappoint you. The service was extremely friendly.

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Very nice and cozy place not far from the Rembrandtplein. The woman who served us (not sure if it she is the owner of this place) was so funny and friendly, it was a pleasure to talk to her. ‚Ä¶

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Excellent coffee place, lack of vegan options tho, but very cheap in the city centre!

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Pure Coffee (Zuivere Koffie) is a very narrow coffeehouse that you might pass by without noticing. It is a coffeehouse with lots of character, free wifi and a garden/terrace.. A little gem to escape from the busy city. ‚Ä¶

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text:
A magical garden patio, absolutely delicious coffee and the strudel was deeeelicious. I came here twice during my visit to Amsterdam and it was full of locals enjoying coffee and sandwiches, or doing work on their laptops.
Lovely employees as well üòä

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Nice place to go sit and relax, the staff, consisting out of only ladies, is friendly. I went here last weekend for a cup of coffee and an update on the news, reading one of their papers in the back garden. ‚Ä¶

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: I genuinely don't understand nice reviews regarding coffee taste in this caffe . We had our breakfast there and had latte + cappuccino + bagels. Bagels were good, no questions. The staff were very nice and friendly. The terrace is also very ‚Ä¶

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: A lovely little cafe. Great coffee, omelette and terrific apple pie! Plus: WiFi if you need to work while enjoying your pie :)

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Friendly owners, reasonable pricing, goog coffee & tasty food!

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Lovely little cafe with delicious food and coffee. Croissants and eggs and cheese and mmmm... Great WiFi and a friendly cat make it perfect!

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: What a wonderful place. I felt so welcome here and everything is delicious!

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: 10/10: this is the cutest place. The staff was extremely friendly and nice. They even went out of their way to make a breakfast meal for me although it was already lunch time! ‚Ä¶

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Lovely quiet spot for coffee, breakfast, or a quick lunch. They have outdoor seating in the back, a nice big communal table, gluten free bread (!) and great selection of desserts (not so gluten free). ‚Ä¶

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Great coffee and food choices. Very nice staff and great service

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Not much left of these special breakfast/lunch diners. Owner is a very sweet lady and the women who are working there are wonderful. I worked for a long time across the street. They even brought my lunch if I was working alone in the store. Would go and eat lunch or get coffee in a heartbeat

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Such a nice place here. We came twice during our visit to Amsterdam. I can really recommend this place. When you enter Zuivere Koffie, you immediately feel like you visit your well known aunt, such Bering home feeling. The breakfast is ‚Ä¶

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Very little and very cosy caff√®. Staff is lovely and I am not sure but I think owner cooks herself. My omelette with parma ham and garganzola was amazing! Highly recommended. They have also nice selection of homemade cakes.

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Amazing coffee and extremely friendly staff. There was even a communal caf√© cat who perused around the shop in hopes of scraping up some leftover nibbles. Very hospitable atmosphere and the garden in the back is lovely (if you can find a table).

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: My all time favorite breakfast place. Staff are the sweetest people and they‚Äôre dog friendly (although they do have a cat and another dog there sometimes). ‚Ä¶

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Coffee with hot milk, omelet and croissant was good. Also homemade pie was great! And inside of cafe was nice and sweet.  I highly recommend, if you are nearby.

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: I go here every now and then for a coffee and cake or a tosti. Staff is always incredibly friendly and their food tastes good! Looks super cute on the inside as well

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Cosy little coffee place, perfect place to start off your morning. Had eggs and bacon on toast which was really tasty. I also got a new friend that sat beside me during my breakfast.

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: We sat in their small back garden and enjoyed the good coffee and food. Then a small observation(not a complaint), we recognized that the most noisy talk coming from the staff not from the customer tables ‚ò∫ To mention, they are quite friendly and taking care of all their guests.

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Personally I like to do business with people who I know are good people. We were not able to enjoy coffee at this shop but on a recent trip my father stumbled at the train station and the staff at the coffee shop were incredibly helpful as we waited for emergency personnel to arrive. Next time we are there I will be back for coffee!

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Lovely place, cozy and with a very homely feel, serving great breakfast and brunch. The bread rolls and eggs were awesome, and so was the carrot cake!

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Always feels like a home away from home. Good living room vibes and the staff are super friendly (if you need mum-love this is the place for you). Great food and drinks!!

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Good price, decent food in an awesome location. They have a small garden that brings a bit of relaxation in the hectic heart of the city. The cat that is lying around is sweet and awesome, make sure to give it some of your attention ;)

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Great outdoor seating area, lovely staff and great coffee

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Super lovely decor with flowers and lots of homemade love. The backyard is a cosy corner in Amsterdam's center and yet surrounded by trees and plants. Tops the hospitality and authenticity list. Vegetarian friendly.

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Great place with a nice atmosphere. The terrace is really nice in the summer and their sandwiches, especially the bacon bagel, are delicious. I highly recommend stopping by for breakfast or lunch.

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Cute, cozy cafe with great drinks, food, and dessert. Staff is very friendly, and the cafe cat, Sammie, is adorable. It‚Äôs my favorite cafe in Amsterdam.

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Cozy place to have home-made breakfast-brunch; we had fresh fruit juices, a delicious carrot cake and a croissant. Capuccino also very nice.

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Cozy place on a cute street with a wide variety of food (mostly sandwiches) to choose from and friendly staff. Go for the atmosphere, not coffee.

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Super nice little terrasse and woody interior . Can be described perfectly by the word "quaint". Good cakes, coffes and tees, charming people. Not much variety in the cooking, if that's important...

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text: Very tasty breakfast in a very cozy coffee

Review Text:
Dog Lovers Go Here!
Great food (the quiche and salad is lovely and the Iced Cappucino is delicious), great welcome from the friendly staff, beautiful garden to enjoy on nice days and they are super dog-friendly!

Name: Zuivere Koffie
Review Text:
Lovely cute place!!! Delicious breakfast!!

Name: Zuivere Koffie
